category: news
title: "Digital health app Juli shows worth in asthma, depression"
excerpt: "Patients using Juli experienced a mean 5.33-point rise in Asthma Control Test (ACT) scores, rising from 12.60 to 17.93, compared to 16.24 for the control group, which the study investigators said suggests that the app could augment existing care pathways for asthma."
